titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the clean fuel production credit.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the clean fuel production credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill repeals the business tax credit for clean fuel production beginning in 2025. (Under current law, the business tax credit for clean fuel production is available for the production and sale of qualified transportation fuel between 2025 and 2027.)
